result.ga: Aistrigh go Béarla é le do thoil
result.orig: Aistrigh go Béarla é le do thoil
result.html: Aistrigh go Béarla é le do thoilTranslate it into English please.
result.ponchtml: Aistriġ go Béarla é le do ṫoilTranslate it into English please.

result.eng: The language they spoke was Irish and not English.
result.ga: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siad
result.orig: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siad
result.html: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siadThe language they spoke was Irish and not English.
result.ponchtml: Ba í Gaeilge seaċas Béarla an teanga a laḃair siadThe language they spoke was Irish and not English.

result.eng: Ráidió na Gaeltachta doesn't play music in English.
result.ga: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.orig: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.html: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na GaeltachtaRáidió na Gaeltachta doesn't play music in English.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na GaeltaċtaRáidió na Gaeltachta doesn't play music in English.

result.eng: Immigrants usually don't speak good English.
result.ga: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircigh
result.orig: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircigh
result.html: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircighImmigrants usually don't speak good English.
result.ponchtml: Ní gnáċ Béarla maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag inimirciġImmigrants usually don't speak good English.

result.eng: I am fluent in Irish and English.
result.ga: Tá Gaeilge agus Béarla líofa agam
result.orig: Tá Gaeilge agus Béarla líofa agam
result.html: Tá Gaeilge agus Béarla líofa agamI am fluent in Irish and English.
result.ponchtml: Tá Gaeilge agus Béarla líofa agamI am fluent in Irish and English.
